title: Sand Witch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Turn someone into sand and use your gained abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> When you turn someone into sand, you attack them. You then permanently gain their abilities.

> You may turn someone into sand and use 1 gained ability from each person you have turned into sand/a sand sandwich.

> This role cannot spawn naturally. It spawns from **Sandwich** (1864).

> The entire town will be notified when a **Sand Witch** has been transformed into.

desc:
Post 1865
*"Finally, after centuries of being trapped in that sandwich I can finally take over the town."*
